description: Land surface properties will use a common of leaf area index dataset (LAI3g) at 1/4 degree resolution provided by HighResMIP. No dynamic vegetation and a constant land use/land cover consistent with the present-day period, centered around 2000.
name: Present Day Land Surface Forcing with LAI3g LAI
rationale: Land surface forcing with common leaf area index (LAI) data to aid comparability.
longName: land surface present day forcing with LAI3g leaf area index data
keywords: HighresMIP, present day, land surface properties, LAI3g leaf area index
